data.title: Rosa Icela Rodríguez se reúne con Jucopo para dar respuesta a peticiones de CNTE
data.description: Rosa Icela Rodríguez, la secretaria de Gobernación, se reunió en privado por más de tres horas con la Junta de Coordinación Política de la Cámara de Diputados esta tarde para dar respuesta a las peticiones de los integrantes de la Coordinadora Nacional de Trabajadores de la Educación (CNTE).En conferencia de prensa tras la reunión, la funcionaria federal sostuvo que, pese a bloqueos y manifestaciones en la Ciudad de México, la respuesta del gobierno federal ha sido una oferta de diálogo y el incremento salarial anunciado el 15 de mayo.MARGARITA NICOLÁS, CADENA RASA: Secretaria, buenas tardes, al coordinador Ricardo Monreal y bueno, a todos sus acompañantes, Gaby, César, a todos.  Preguntarle, de esta plática, ¿cuál fue el compromiso que se asumió por parte de la secretaria Rosa Icela Rodríguez? Esa sería la primera.Y también, ¿cómo van, secretaria, las negociaciones con la CNTE? Porque hay diálogos, sin embargo, parece que ellos no los están respetando y, sobre todo, la molestia que hay en la ciudadanía, por tanto, bloqueo que existe. Entonces, ¿qué es lo que van a hacer?, ¿qué es lo que está fallando en el diálogo, los negociadores o los proyectos que les están ustedes presentando? Muchas gracias.SECRETARIA DE GOBERNACIÓN, ROSA ICELA RODRÍGUEZ (RIR): Muchas gracias, Margarita. Lo primero que les quiero decir es que, como dijo el coordinador, este que estamos culminando, fue un diálogo productivo, producto –precisamente– de la buena relación con los legisladores aquí, en la Cámara de Diputados, liderados por el presidente de la Junta de Coordinación Política, Ricardo Monreal. El diputado hace esta reunión para proporcionar información a los Grupos Parlamentarios. Entonces, esta reunión plural tuvo el acento en las preocupaciones de cada uno de los coordinadores de los grupos parlamentarios. Y creo que todas las preguntas fueron respondidas, pero también hubo el compromiso de que aquellas cuestiones que no hayan sido resueltas, lo podemos hacer en reuniones en días siguientes. Incluso, les dije que si querían tener una reunión en la secretaría para ver específicamente problemas y temas que sean de interés, pero también del gobierno. Abordamos temas de migración, temas de seguridad; también las elecciones, la elección del próximo primero de junio. Dijimos que las elecciones serán en paz, que estamos invitando a todos los mexicanos, mexicanas, ciudadanas, ciudadanos a acudir a las urnas. Pero que también, en aquellas, inquietudes que tuvieran sobre los temas de seguridad, se va a atender por parte del Gobierno de México y de los de las respectivas entidades en donde habrá elecciones.También me preguntaron sobre el tema de la CNTE, de las movilizaciones que están habiendo aquí, y la respuesta nuestra, en resumen, es que les hemos ofrecido diálogo, diálogo y más diálogo. Y cuando nos cansemos también, diálogo. Queremos hacer patente que estamos conscientes de las molestias que ocasionan a la ciudadanía; pero también dijimos que el Gobierno de México no es un gobierno represor, que nosotros seguimos extendiendo la mano para ir a sentarnos a la mesa, y que los ofrecimientos que se han hecho hasta el momento, sean tomados en cuenta.No se puede dar, por ejemplo, lo que ellos piden, un 100% de incremento salarial. Es un 10% que ya se dio el día 15 de mayo. Pero, hay otras cuestiones que se pueden ir construyendo, y lo que los invitamos es a sentarnos a la mesa.Por lo pronto, yo saliendo de aquí, a partir de este momento, estoy en sesión permanente en la Secretaría de Gobernación para recibirlos de la mejor manera. Cuando nos sentamos, podemos llegar a acuerdos.Y también que tomen en cuenta un gran avance, que significa el congelamiento de la edad mínima de jubilación. Se propuso mantener la edad mínima a 58 años para hombres, 56 para mujeres, evitando que aumente a 60 años como está previsto en la ley. Nosotros estamos con ofertas concretas que requieren los maestros. La Presidenta nos ha instruido: siéntense, lleguen a acuerdos, a buenos acuerdos que beneficien al magisterio nacional. Aquí nosotros ponemos por encima de todos los intereses particulares, de grupos, el interés nacional y del magisterio. Vamos a estar trabajando; queremos sentarnos para ver cómo van a ser las reglas sobre la desaparición del Usicamm, en fin, varias de las cuestiones que ellos están refiriendo. Vamos a seguir extendiendo la mano y la mesa puesta para el diálogo. PREGUNTA: ¿Se mantiene la reunión con la Presidenta, mañana?RIR: La pregunta es, ¿ellos quieren la mesa? La hemos estado nosotros ofreciendo, pero en estas condiciones, pregunto también a ellos, a ustedes, había una oferta o hay una oferta de una reunión. Pero, ¿en estas condiciones se puede hacer?, ¿se debe hacer? Afectando a la población, afectando a los niños que se quedan sin clases? No sé.MAXI PELÁEZ, TV AZTECA: Gracias. Sin duda, resulta difícil, secretaria, coordinador, hacerle tres preguntas, cuando es usted una de las funcionarias del gobierno federal, pues que tiene mucha importancia.Entonces, las preguntas que hemos hecho están consensuadas con esta fuente. Y a mí me toca, y le voy a hacer una de pilón, porque creo que no puedo dejarla ir sin hacérsela:  El secretario de Estado de Estados Unidos, Marco Rubio ha señalado que la violencia política en México es real, esto tras la muerte de dos, -lamentable-, de dos colaboradores de la jefa de Gobierno capitalino. Y hoy nos tomamos con la noticia de que la Embajada de Estados Unidos en México ha declarado áreas de su frontera con México, como extensiones de bases militares, zonas de defensa nacional, y advierte arrestos, multas, detencionesLa pregunta es: ¿México está en alerta por estas acciones de su vecino del norte? ¿Y qué acciones va a tomar el gobierno mexicano? Y tengo otra que es referente a la demanda civil que hoy una Corte de Miami, en Florida, ha hecho a Genaro García Luna, donde le obliga a pagar al Gobierno de México 2 mil 400 millones de dólares por contratos ilegales en administraciones de Peña Nieto y Calderón. Ese dinero ingresaría a México. La veo contenta por eso.RIR: Primero, la parte de lo que usted pregunta, sobre el servidor público, funcionario de Estados Unidos.   La Presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum ha sido muy clara en mantener la coordinación, unas relaciones cordiales con Estados Unidos. Hoy mismo, ha hablado ella con el presidente Donald Trump, entonces nosotros le apostamos a eso. De ninguna manera, ningún servidor público de México, estamos autorizados para hacer alguna declaración que no lleve siempre a la buena relación con Estados Unidos. Lo quiero dejar claro. Porque esto no implica solamente una cuestión política, sino que implica cuestiones económicas y sociales de otro tipo. Nosotros vamos a tener buenas relaciones y buena coordinación con Estados Unidos, independientemente de declaraciones que se tengan por el vecino país. Nuestra apuesta siempre es al diálogo, a la concertación con las autoridades de Estados Unidos, pero además con la buena fortuna de que ya hay un embajador en México. Tenemos confianza también, de que ese buen diálogo se aterrice con reuniones que tendremos próximamente. Entonces, yo decirle que, definitivamente, cualquier cuestión que nosotros tengamos con algún servidor público en Estados Unidos, nosotros vamos a ver qué es lo que pasa en cada uno de los asuntos, y pues lamentamos aquí los hechos. No estamos diciendo que no es una cosa preocupante; hechos lamentables que han ocurrido en la Ciudad de México. Vamos a estar pendientes.Ahora, yo les quiero dar un dato sobre el tema de migración de México a Estados Unidos. La reducción que se ha tenido en la parte de la migración hacia Estados Unidos, por parte no solamente de mexicanos, sino de personas que van hacia la frontera norte de nuestro país, la reducción de este tipo de proceso, el proceso migratorio es de 96%.Imagínense cuánto trabajo hay atrás para conseguir estos datos; para conseguir esa cifra de reducción que es un gran logro para el Gobierno de México: 96% de reducción en la migración. Veremos de qué se trata y estaremos pendientes. No es una evaluación que tiene que hacer solamente la Secretaría de Gobernación, sino todo el Gabinete de Seguridad, de conocer bien, bien, cuáles son los datos para poder opinar sobre el cambio que se está dando, que ya había iniciado, no es nuevo. PREGUNTA: ¿Pero sí nos debe preocupar esta parte de que declaren extensiones militares?RIR: Hasta el momento no ha habido un tema, no es la primera, no es el primer paso que se ha dado al respecto; no estoy diciendo que no es preocupante o sí es preocupante, lo que digo es que hay que estar atentos.Ahora, es una buena noticia de Estados Unidos. Me parece que tendremos que estudiar bien, está aquí el boletín que ustedes ya lo tienen, pero tenemos que ver la letra chiquita, qué es lo que pasa, en qué tiempos.Pero, bueno, es una muy buena noticia el que una Corte del Condado de Miami, haya decidido que retornen recursos para el gobierno mexicano por parte del señor García Luna y su esposa; entonces es una buena noticia. PREGUNTA: ¿Habrá entonces dinero, ¿no?RIR: Pues, muchas gracias, hoy, por su atención.
data.translatedTitle: Rosa Icela Rodríguez meets with Jucopo to respond to CNTE requests
data.translatedDescription: Rosa Icela Rodríguez, the Secretary of the Interior, met privately for more than three hours with the Political Coordination Board of the Chamber of Deputies this afternoon to respond to the requests of the members of the National Coordinator of Education Workers (CNTE). At press conference after the meeting, the federal official said that, despite blockages and demonstrations in Mexico City, the response of the federal government has been an offer of dialogue Salary announced on May 15.Marrita Nicolás, Cadena Rasa: Secretary, Good afternoon, to the coordinator Ricardo Monreal and well, to all his companions, Gaby, César, to all.  Ask him, what was the commitment that was assumed by the secretary Rosa Icela Rodríguez? That would be the first, and how, how are you going, secretary, negotiations with the CNTE? Because there are dialogues, however, it seems that they are not respecting them and, above all, the discomfort in citizens, therefore, blockade that exists. So what are you going to do? What are you failing in the dialogue, the negotiators or the projects that you are presenting to you? Thank you very much.Secretary of the Interior, Rosa Icela Rodríguez (Rir): Thank you very much, Margarita. The first thing I want to tell you is that, as the coordinator said, this that we are culminating, was a productive dialogue, product - of the good relationship with the legislators here, in the Chamber of Deputies, led by the president of the Political Coordination Board, Ricardo Monreal. The deputy makes this meeting to provide information to parliamentary groups. Then, this plural meeting was accent on the concerns of each of the coordinators of the parliamentary groups. And I think all the questions were answered, but there was also the commitment that those issues that have not been resolved, we can do in meetings in following days. I even told them that if they wanted to have a meeting in the secretariat to specifically see problems and issues that are of interest, but also of the government. We address migration issues, security issues; Also the elections, the election of the next June 1. We said that the elections will be in peace, that we are inviting all Mexicans, Mexican, citizens, citizens to go to the polls. But that also, in those, concerns that had on the security issues, will be addressed by the Government of Mexico and those of the respective entities where there will be elections. They also asked me about the subject of the CNTE, of the mobilizations that are having here, and the ours answer, in summary, is that we have offered them dialogue, dialogue and more dialogue. And when we get tired too, dialogue. We want to make clear that we are aware of the inconvenience that cause citizens; But we also said that the Government of Mexico is not a repressive government, that we continue to extend our hand to go to sit at the table, and that the offers that have been made so far, are taken into account. It can not be given, for example, what they ask, a 100% salary increase. It is 10% that has already occurred on May 15. But, there are other issues that can be built, and what we invite you is to sit at the table. For now, I getting out of here, from this moment, I am in permanent session in the Ministry of the Interior to receive them in the best way. When we sit down, we can reach agreements. And also that they take into account great advance, which means the freezing of the minimum retirement age. It was proposed to keep the minimum age 58 years for men, 56 for women, preventing it from increasing at 60 years as provided in the law. We are with concrete offers that teachers require. The president has instructed us: feel, reach agreements, to good agreements that benefit the national teaching. Here we put over all particular interests, groups, national interest and teaching. We will be working; We want to sit down to see how the rules about the disappearance of Usicamm will be, in short, several of the issues they are referring to. We will continue to extend the hand and table set for dialogue. Question: Is the meeting with the president, tomorrow? Rir: the question is, do they want the table? We have been offering it, but in these conditions, I also ask them, to you, there was an offer or there is an offer of a meeting. But can it be done in these conditions? Should it be done? Affecting the population, affecting children who run out of classes? I don't know.Maxi Peláez, TV Azteca: Thank you. Without a doubt, it is difficult, secretary, coordinator, ask you three questions, when you are one of the federal government officials, because it is very important. Then, the questions we have asked are agreed with this source. And it touches me, and I am going to make a pylon, because I think I can not let it go without making it: the United States Secretary of State, Marco Rubio has indicated that political violence in Mexico is real, this after the death of two, -Lamentable-, of two collaborators of the head of capital government. And today we take with the news that the United States embassy in Mexico has declared areas of its border with Mexico, as extensions of military bases, national defense zones, and warns arrests, fines, arrest the question is: Mexico is on alert for these actions of its northern neighbor? And what actions will the Mexican government take? And I have another that is referring to the civil lawsuit that today a Miami Court, in Florida, has made Genaro García Luna, where he forces him to pay the Government of Mexico 2,400 million dollars for illegal contracts in administrations of Peña Nieto and Calderón. That money would enter Mexico. I see her happy for that.   President Claudia Sheinbaum has been very clear in maintaining coordination, cordial relations with the United States. Today, she talked to President Donald Trump, so we bet on that. In no way, no public servant from Mexico, we are authorized to make a statement that does not always lead to the good relationship with the United States. I want to make it clear. Because this does not only imply a political issue, but implies economic and social issues of another. We are going to have good relations and good coordination with the United States, regardless of statements that are for the neighboring country. Our bet is always to dialogue, to the Concertación with the United States authorities, but also with the good fortune that there is already an ambassador to Mexico. We also have confidence that this good dialogue is landed with meetings that we will have soon. So, I tell him that, definitely, any issue that we have with a public servant in the United States, we are going to see what happens in each of the affairs, and then we regret here the facts. We are not saying that it is not a worrying thing; Unfortunate events that have occurred in Mexico City. We will be pending. Now, I want to give you a fact on the issue of migration from Mexico to the United States. The reduction that has been had in the part of migration to the United States, by not only Mexicans, but of people who go to the northern border of our country, the reduction of this type of process, the immigration process is 96%.imaging how much work is behind to get this data; To achieve that reduction figure that is a great achievement for the Government of Mexico: 96% reduction in migration. We will see what it is and we will be pending. It is not an evaluation that only the Ministry of the Interior has to do, but the entire security cabinet, of knowing well, well, what are the data to comment on the change that is being given, which had already started, is not new. Over: So far there has been a topic, it is not the first, it is not the first step that has been taken in this regard; I am not saying that it is not worrying or yes it is worrisome, what I say is that you have to be attentive. Now, it is good news from the United States. It seems to me that we will have to study well, here is the bulletin that you already have, but we have to see the small letter, what happens, at what time, well, it is very good news that a court of the Miami County has decided to return resources for the Mexican government by Mr. García Luna and his wife; So it's good news. data.title: ¿Una semana de vacaciones extra? Claudia Sheinbaum analiza esta medida para alumnos de la SEP
data.description: Una buena noticia es la que dio la presidenta de México, Claudia Sheinbaum, tanto a los maestros del país como a los alumnos de nivel básico, ya que anunció que se les otorgará una semana más de vacaciones en el próximo ciclo escolar.¿Por qué los alumnos podrían tener una semana más de vacaciones?A pesar de que la propuesta para aumentar el periodo del ciclo escolar se dio en el marco de la celebración del Día del Maestro, la mandataria mexicana explicó esta mañana los motivos del por qué se está contemplando la decisión.La causa se engloba en la comparación con países europeos, ya que de acuerdo con la mandataria mexicana, en aquel continente los niños tienen hasta tres meses de vacaciones, además de que recordó que antes en México era diferente.  “Será una semana más de vacaciones. En mis tiempos salía el 1 de junio y se entraba el 3 de septiembre. Dos meses y medio de vacaciones”, expresó en la conferencia “Mañanera del Pueblo”. La Presidenta externó que se está analizando este ajuste para todos los maestros, ya que fue el ex presidente Ernesto Zedillo (1994-2000), quien solicitó reducir lasvacaciones de verano a los niños.Sobre la propuesta, la Presidenta explicó que se ha hecho en coordinación con el  secretario de Educación, Mario Delgado, pues se trata, a su parecer, de algo importante para los maestros, así como para losmenores. “Planteamos una semana más de vacaciones. Las y los niños también, jugar es algo importante y fundamental para el desarrollo de la infancia”, expresó desde el podio de Palacio Nacional.Y es que la iniciativa se dio a conocer durante un evento que encabezó Sheinbaum Pardo el pasado jueves 15 de mayo (Día del Maestro), donde expresó que se hizo un análisis de los calendarios escolares en todas partes del mundo.Por ello, se decidió incluir una semana más de vacaciones a las maestras y a losmaestros como parte de su trabajo.Sin embargo, aún no se ha precisado en qué fecha o periodo del próximo calendario escolar del ciclo 2025-2026, estará visible para los niños y docentes.
data.translatedTitle: A week of extra holiday? Claudia Sheinbaum analyzes this measure for SEP students
data.translatedDescription: Good news is the one given by the president of Mexico, Claudia Sheinbaum, both to the country's teachers and basic level students, since she announced that they will be awarded a week of vacation in the next school year. Why could students have a week more on vacation? Although the proposal to increase the period of the school The decision is being contemplated. The cause is included in the comparison with European countries, since according to the Mexican president, in that continent children have up to three months of vacation, in addition to that he recalled that before in Mexico it was different.  "It will be another week on vacation. In my time I left on June 1 and entered on September 3. Two and a half months of vacation," he said at the “Mañanera del Pueblo” conference. The president said that this adjustment is being analyzed for all teachers, since it was former President Ernesto Zedillo (1994-2000), who requested to reduce the summervacations of the children. "We propose another week on vacation. The children too, playing is something important and fundamental for the development of childhood," he said from the National Palace podium. And it is that the initiative was released during an event headed by Sheinbaum Pardo last Thursday, May 15 (teacher's day), where he said that an analysis of school calendars was made in all parts of the world. to the most part of their work. However, it has not yet been specified on what date or period of the next school calendar of the 2025-2026 cycle, it will be visible for children and teachers.

data.title: ¿Cómo ubicar tu casilla para votar en las elecciones locales de Veracruz?
data.description:
En el marco del proceso electoral local 2025 en Veracruz, el Instituto Nacional Electoral (INE) habilitó la herramienta digital 'Ubica tu casilla', con el fin de que las y los ciudadanos localicen fácilmente el lugar donde les corresponde votar este 1 de junio.En MILENIO te explicamos cómo funciona ésta herramienta para que su consulta sea más sencilla.​¿Cómo ubicar tu casilla en la página del INE?Necesitarás tener a la mano tu credencial para votar para que la navegación sea más fácil.Primero, ingresa a la página https://ubicatucasilla.ine.mx/, te pedirá que selecciones tu entidad y tu sección. Para saber qué sección eres, ubica el apartardo del mismo nombre al frente de tu credencial, en la parte inferior derecha.Una vez completado este paso, el sistema te mostrará:Dirección exacta de tu casilla.El tipo de casilla que te corresponde: básica (B), contigua (C), extraordinaria (E) o especial, según corresponda.Un mapa con la dirección geográfica.Casillas especialesEstas casillas están habilidadas en cada estado para quienes están fuera de su sección o municipio el día de las votaciones. Puedes consultar las casillas disponibles en la misma página seleccionando la entidad en la que te encuentras y dando clic en 'casilla especial' en el apartado de 'sección'.Recomendaciones antes de votarEs recomendable que consultes tu casilla con anticipación y no el día de las votaciones, ya que podrían pesentarse saturaciones en la página.No olvides tener cerca tu credencial para votar para facilitarla búsqueda y consulta de tu casilla.Toma nota de la dirección y busca cómo llegar para evitar contratiempos.¡Que no se te pase! ???? Ubica tu casilla: https://t.co/XgKmeNlHsl y vota este 1 de junio en las #EleccionesJudiciales. pic.twitter.com/RWr7os4dTJ— @INEMexico (@INEMexico) May 23, 2025


AV

Within the framework of the 2025 local electoral process in Veracruz, the National Electoral Institute (INE) enabled the digital tool 'Ubica your box', so that citizens easily locate the place where they correspond to vote this June 1. First, enter the page https://ubicatucasilla.ine.mx/, will ask you to select your entity and your section. To know what section you are, place the apartment of the same name at the head of your credential, in the lower right. Once this step is completed, the system will show you: exact address of your box. The type of box that corresponds to you: basic (b), contiguous (c), extraordinary (e) or special, as appropriate. A map with the geographical direction. Voting Day. data.title: Dan más de 450 mil becas a estudiantes de nivel básico y superior en Sonora
data.description: Alfonso Durazo, gobernador de Sonora, ha impulsado la entrega universal de becas y tarjetas SIM con internet gratuitocomo parte del Programa Sonora de oportunidades, con el objetivo de fortalecer la formación de estudiantes de los distintos niveles educativos, reduciendo la deserción escolar y la brecha digital en la entidad.Esta acción forma parte de su compromiso con la educación pública, equitativa e incluyente.​¿Cuántas becas se han entregado?En el marco del Día del Estudiante, Durazo Montaño detalló que, de septiembre de 2021 a abril de 2025, el gobierno de Sonora ha entregado un total de 465 mil 197 estímulos económicos a estudiantes de nivel básico y superior, con una inversión de 2 mil 247 millones 369 mil 331 pesos que representa el presupuesto más grande para becas en la historia de la entidad.Esta iniciativa ha permitido que miles de niñas, niños y jóvenes permanezcan en las aulas y tengan mejores oportunidades de desarrollo.“La educación es la gran igualadora de oportunidades. Con estas becas y apoyos tecnológicos, estamos asegurando que cada una, cada uno de los estudiantes, desde el Sonora profundo y cada rincón de la entidad, continúe con sus estudios, porque en mi gobierno apostamos por una educación pública de calidad, inclusiva y al alcance de todas y todos”, expresó.En los primeros cuatro meses de 2025, el mandatario estatal ha otorgado 87 mil 861 becas, con una inversión de 322 millones 874 mil 322 pesos, lo que demuestra la continuidad y solidez del programa.¿Qué otras acciones al respecto se realizaron?Por otra parte, el mandatario estatal, destacó que, con objetivo de reducir la brecha digital, se han distribuido más de 19 mil tarjetas SIM para estudiantes universitarios de instituciones públicas.Los objetos contienen servicio gratuito por seis meses, llamadas y mensajes ilimitados, redes sociales nacionales sin límite y 7 GB mensuales para navegación libre.Con el Programa de becas Sonora de oportunidades se ha logrado reducir la deserción escolar al 10%de 2021 a la fecha. Este logro rompe con la tendencia al alza que se registraba desde sexenios anteriores, marcando un cambio positivo en la permanencia escolar en la entidad.MD
data.translatedTitle: They give more than 450 thousand scholarships to students of basic and higher level in Sonora
data.translatedDescription: Alfonso Durazo, governor of Sonora, has promoted the universal delivery of scholarships and SIM cards with free internet as part of the sound program of opportunities, with the aim of strengthening the training of students of the different educational levels, reducing school dropout and digital divide in the entity. This action is part of their commitment to public, equitable and inclusive education. How many scholarships have been delivered? Montaño explained that, from September 2021 to April 2025, the Sonora Government has delivered a total of 465 thousand 197 economic stimuli to students of basic and higher level, with an investment of 2 thousand 247 million 369 thousand 331 pesos that represents the largest budget for scholarships in the history of the entity. This initiative has allowed thousands of girls, boys and young people to remain in the classrooms and have better development opportunities. Education is the great equalizer of opportunities. 322 million 874 thousand 322 pesos, which demonstrates the continuity and solidity of the program. What other actions were carried out? On the other hand, the state president, stressed that, with the objective of reducing the digital divide, more than 19 thousand SIM cards have been distributed for university students for public institutions. Free.With the Sound Scholarship Program of Opportunities, 10%of 2021 to date has been reduced to date. This achievement breaks with the upward trend that was recorded from previous six years, marking a positive change in school permanence in the entity.

data.title: Culiacán se suma al 'Plan Hídrico' de Sheinbaum": Juan de Dios Gámez
data.description: Rubén Rocha, gobernador de Sinaloa, dio el banderazo de inicio a la construcción de la planta potabilizadora de agua Norte, acompañado del alcalde Juan de Dios Gámez Mendívil.El mandatario destacó que esta es la segunda planta que inicia su construcción en este año, en la que se invertirán 86 millones de pesos. Esto se suma a los lineamientos del Plan Hídrico presentado por la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum, con el objetivo de garantizar el derecho y el acceso seguro al agua potable.​¿Cómo aportará esta acción al Plan Hídrico?El impulso a los proyectos hídricos en el municipio es para hacer justicia social a la población de todos los rincones de Culiacán. Por ello, el Plan Hídrico incluye la planta potabilizadora de agua de la zona sur, cuya construcción comenzó hace dos meses.Además de la anunciada ayer para la sindicatura de El Salado, y una más que se construirá en la zona oriente de la ciudad.“La presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum sabe lo importante que es contar con proyectos de agua; por eso, desde el Ayuntamiento decidimos invertir de manera significativa”, puntualizó el alcalde.Asimismo, destacó que, aunque la magnitud de estas obras no siempre es visible, el impacto positivo en la vida de la ciudadanía será profundo.¿Cómo impactará esto en la población?Además, el alcalde resaltó que gracias a una alianza entre la iniciativa privada, los tres niveles de gobierno y el pueblo, “vamos a generar bienestar y desarrollo económico en Culiacán”. Esto mediante la construcción de más plantas potabilizadoras de agua y más de 17 mil viviendas a bajo costo, temas que son prioritarios para la mandataria del Ejecutivo.Por su parte, el gobernador Rubén Rocha precisó que con la puesta en marcha de estas plantas potabilizadoras se busca mejorar de manera sostenible el acceso al agua potable para todos.“No van a tener que esperar un día sí y otro no, porque —como ya lo dijo Juan de Dios— acabamos de iniciar la construcción de otra planta”, resaltó el gobernador.Durante la exposición técnica de la obra, el titular de la Junta de Agua Potable y Alcantarillado de Culiacán (JAPAC), Roberto Alfonso Zazueta Tapia, explicó que la planta potabilizadora Norte, ubicada en Las Cucas, representará una inversión de 86 millones 993 mil 327 pesos. Tendrá una capacidad de 100 litros por segundo y beneficiará a más de 45 mil habitantes.En representación de los habitantes del sector norte beneficiado, la señora Blanca Vaca agradeció la coordinación de los tres niveles de gobierno para la consolidación del proyecto, el cual garantizará el suministro de agua potable a miles de familias.“Este banderazo no solo es un símbolo, es un acto de compromiso”, destacó Blanca Vaca.¿Qué colonias serán suministradas?Las siguientes 29 coloniasbeneficiadas con el suministro de agua de la planta potabilizadora Norte serán:Arboledas.Jardines de la Sierra.Hacienda Arboledas.Parque Alamedas.Los Alamitos.Bicentenario.Loma de Rodríguez.Hacienda Los Huertos.Los Huertos.San Fermín.Invies.Los Mezcales.Marsella.Rotarismo.Bosques del Alamo.Los Girasoles.Hacienda Alameda.Alameda.Lirios del Río.Los Ciruelos.Heriberto Castillo Martínez.Ejido La Pitahayita.Paseo Alameda.Las Cerezas.La Pitayita.MD
data.translatedTitle: Culiacán adds to the 'water plan' of Sheinbaum ": Juan de Dios Gámez
data.translatedDescription: Rubén Rocha, governor of Sinaloa, gave the starting flag to the construction of the North Water Potabilizer Plant, accompanied by Mayor Juan de Dios Gámez Mendívil. The president stressed that this is the second plant that begins its construction in this year, in which 86 million pesos will be invested. This adds to the guidelines of the Water Plan presented by President Claudia Sheinbaum, with the aim of guaranteeing safe law and access to drinking water. How will this action contribute to the water plan? The impulse to water projects in the municipality is to do social justice to the population of all corners of Culiacán. Therefore, the Water Plan includes the water waterwhing plant in the southern zone, whose construction began two months ago. In addition to the one announced yesterday for the Salado Syndicate, and one more that will be built in the eastern part of the city. “President Claudia Sheinbaum knows how important it is to have water projects; so, from the City Council we decided to invest significantly,” said Mayor. This through the construction of more water water treatment plants and more than 17 thousand homes at low cost, issues that are priority to the executive's president. Because of their part, Governor Rubén Rocha said that with the implementation of these water treatment plants, it seeks to improve in a sustainable way access to drinking water for all. “They will not have to wait one day yes and another Plant, ”said the governor. During the technical exhibition of the work, the head of the Board of Potable Water and Sewerage of Culiacán (Japac), Roberto Alfonso Zazueta Tapia, explained that the northern water treatment plant, located in Las Cucas, will represent an investment of 86 million 993 thousand 327 pesos. It will have a capacity of 100 liters per second and will benefit more than 45 thousand inhabitants. In representation of the inhabitants of the northern sector benefited, Mrs. Vaca thanked the coordination of the three levels of government for the consolidation of the project, which will guarantee the supply of drinking water to thousands of families. "This flag is not only a symbol, it is an act of commitment," said Blanca Vaca. Bonus colonies with the water supply of the northern water treatment plant will be: groves. data.title: Reforma judicial corre riesgo de fallar si no se vota con conciencia: Jaime Allier
data.description:
Jaime Allier Campuzano, candidato a ministro de la Suprema Corte de Justicia de la Nación (SCJN), dijo que se debe votar con conciencia para que la reforma judicial “sea exitosa”.El aspirante a cargo judicial considera que “se puede infiltrar la delincuencia organizada en el seno del Poder Judicial” o “pueden resultar ministros, magistrados o jueces los que fueron más populares o los más graciosos en las redes sociales”.Justicia para grupos vulnerablesEn entrevista para MILENIO Televisión con Héctor Zamarrón y Cecilia Salamanca, el licenciado en Derecho dijo que dará justicia a los grupos vulnerables.“Como lo son los campesinos, los trabajadores, los indígenas, los migrantes y las madres solteras, que exigen una aplicación del derecho de manera pronta y eficaz”. El candidato Allier declaró que su fundamental propuesta se reduce a diferentes puntos los cuales designa como “primero, respeto a los derechos humanos, segundo respeto al principio de división de poderes, tercero, respeto a principios de legalidad e independencia judicial y la prevalencia de la justicia social sobre los otros tipos de justicia”.Aquí la entrevista:▶️ “La ciudadanía va a tener en sus manos el destino del Poder Judicial”: Jaime Allier (@JaimeAllier), candidato a ministro de la SCJN, habla de su proyecto rumbo a la elección judicial. ????  La entrevista con @hzamarron y @cecysalamanca en #MILENIO17h pic.twitter.com/ZxxDBmkXms— Milenio (@Milenio) May 22, 2025


Allier Campuzano consideró que “el primero de junio, la ciudadanía va a tener en sus manos el destino del Poder Judicial Federal” y enfatizó que el ciudadano requiere conocer los currículums de cada candidato para que vote “por el que estime que se encuentre mejor preparado”. El candidato mencionó sobre la naturaleza y el medio ambiente que “existen una serie de principios que debemos aplicar”, además informó que son “el de precaución”, donde el juez debe tomar medidas para detener un daño,  “el pro- natura”, que es cuando exista alguna duda en la interpretación de una ley, debe interpretarse a favor de la naturaleza y el “pro-agua” el cual se debe cuidar el agua porque es un líquido vital.Aquí la entrevista:▶️ “Somos parte de la naturaleza, es necesario defender el medio ambiente”: Jaime Allier (@JaimeAllier), candidato a ministro de la SCJN, habla de su proyecto rumbo a la elección judicial. ????  La entrevista con @hzamarron y @cecysalamanca en #MILENIO17h pic.twitter.com/ggQcRGIWSQ— Milenio (@Milenio) May 22, 2025

data.title: Polémica jugadas dentro del área generan discusión por no marcarse como penal para el América
data.description:
El primer tiempo entre América y Toluca, en la final del torneo Clausura 2025, terminó en polémica luego de una jugada en la que Luan García abraza a Henry Martín dentro del área.En el minuto 13, el América tenía la pelota por la banda derecha con Kevin Álvarez. El lateral buscaba filtrar la pelota al área, pero no mandó el centro al no ver a Henry Martín habilitado.El detalle fue que Luan García abrazó a Henry en la línea del área cuando este último quiso proyectarse al manchón penal. De inmediato los jugadores del América reclamaron un penal.Instantes más tarde, en una pared entre Zendejas y Sánchez, Marcel Ruiz intervino con una barrida para evitar que Chiquito se metiera al área, pero este último se resbaló. Y pese a que los reclamos continuaron, el árbitro no marcó ambas jugadas.A pesar de que hubo una revisión silenciosa por parte del VAR, las acciones continuaron al no detectar ninguna falta.Reclaman error arbitral y penal a favor del AméricaLuego de que la jugada no quedó en nada, el ex árbitro Felipe Ramos Rizo acusó al VAR y al árbitro Daniel Quintero de no hacer un buen trabajo en la final."El jugador de toluca pierde de vista el balón para sujetar al jugador de América. Penal clarísimo, ni árbitro ni VAR", escribió ex analista de ESPN en su cuenta de X.El jugador de toluca pierde de vista el balón para sujetar al jugador de @ClubAmerica penal clarísimo, ni árbitro ni VAR . pic.twitter.com/H9iMWnUCZL— Felipe Ramos Rizo (@ramosrizo) May 23, 2025


Del mismo modo, los ex árbitros Fernando Guerrero y Francisco Chacón señalaron el mismo error en sus redes sociales. "Penal sobre Henry de América no se sanciona, es una sujeción muy clara de parte del defensor de Toluca", expresó el Cantante.Chacón también reclamó una falta a favor del América al minuto 42, cuando Henry Martín cayó en el área luego de un choque con un central de Toluca, pero el silbante marcó fuera de lugar de Cristian Borja antes de marcarla.Existe otro penal en el min 42 a favor del @ClubAmerica que no se marca sobre Henry Martin, se le señala fuera de juego a Borja pero antes de que se consume el fuera de juego le hacen penal al Henry, pésimo Quintero, no tiene ni idea de la interpretación de las reglas de juego,… pic.twitter.com/KvWXAzGxwD— Francisco Chacón (@pacochaconmx) May 23, 2025


RGS​​
data.translatedTitle: Controversy played within the area generate discussion for not being marked as a penalty for America
data.translatedDescription:
The first half between America and Toluca, in the final of the Clausura 2025 tournament, ended in controversy after a play in which Luan García embraces Henry Martín inside the area. In the 13th minute, America had the ball by the right wing with Kevin Álvarez. The side sought to filter the ball into the area, but did not send the center by not seeing Henry Martín enabled. The detail was that Luan Garcia hugged Henry on the line of the area when the latter wanted to project to the criminal spot. Immediately the players of America claimed a penalty later, in a wall between Zendejas and Sánchez, Marcel Ruiz intervened with a sweep to prevent Chiquito from getting into the area, but the latter slipped. And although the claims continued, the referee did not score both plays. Although there was a silent review by the VAR, the actions continued by not detecting any fault. They recognize arbitration and criminal error in favor of the warning Toluca loses sight of the ball to hold the player of America. pic.twitter.com/h9imwnuczl— Felipe Ramos Rizo (@Ramosrizo) May 23, 2025


Similarly, former referees Fernando Guerrero and Francisco Chacón pointed out the same error in their social networks. "Criminal on Henry de América is not sanctioned, it is a very clear support from the defender of Toluca," said the singer. Chacón also claimed a foul in favor of America at minute 42, when Henry Martín fell in the area after a clash with a central of Toluca, but the whistle marked out of the place of Cristian Borja before marking it. @Clubamerica that is not marked on Henry Martin, is indicated out of play over Borja but before the out of play are made penalty to Henry, lousy quintero, he has no idea of ​​the interpretation of the rules of the game, ... pic.twitter.com/kvwxazgxwd— Francisco Chacón (@pacochaconmx) May 23, 2025


RGS

Ses échéances : les municipales en 2026 et la présidentielle en 2027. Son objectif : faire barrage au Rassemblement national sans La France insoumise.

data.title: Le sud et l’est du Liban bombardés par Israël, la bande de Gaza toujours pilonnée et sans vivres
data.description: L’agence libanaise ANI rapporte que les frappes sont « les plus violentes » depuis l’accord de cessez-le-feu de fin novembre 2024. A Gaza, la défense civile locale recense 52 personnes tuées jeudi.
data.translatedTitle: The south and eastern Lebanon bombed by Israel, the Gaza Strip still pounded and without food
data.translatedDescription: The Lebanese agency is an anxious that strikes have been "the most violent" since the ceasefire agreement in late November 2024. In Gaza, the local civil defense lists 52 people killed on Thursday.

data.title: Fin de vie : l’Assemblée nationale impose la réunion d’un collège de professionnels avant d’accéder à la demande d’aide à mourir d’un patient
data.description: Les députés ont voté, jeudi, un amendement prévoyant une réunion entre un médecin et, a minima, un spécialiste et un soignant pour statuer sur chaque demande. Le texte initial imposait la simple collecte d’avis écrits.
data.translatedTitle: End of life: the National Assembly requires the meeting of a college of professionals before accessing the request for helping a patient
data.translatedDescription: The deputies voted, Thursday, an amendment providing for a meeting between a doctor and, at least, a specialist and a caregiver to rule on each request. The initial text required simple collection of written opinions.

data.title: A Harvard, le coup de massue et l’ultimatum de l’administration Trump
data.description: La plus ancienne et prestigieuse université des Etats-Unis doit, avant dimanche, produire les pièces lui permettant de récupérer son habilitation à accueillir des étudiants étrangers. Un coup dur porté à son rayonnement international et une action jugée « illégale » par sa direction.
data.translatedTitle: In Harvard, the blow and the ultimatum of the Trump administration
data.translatedDescription: The oldest and prestigious University of the United States must, before Sunday, produce the pieces allowing it to recover its authorization to welcome foreign students. A blow brought to its international influence and an action deemed "illegal" by its management.

data.title: La sincérité de la « stratégie climat » de TotalEnergies  examinée devant la justice, une première en France
data.description: Un recours pour « pratiques commerciales trompeuses » avait été déposé, en 2022, par trois ONG contre le géant pétrolier, devant le tribunal judiciaire de Paris. Celles-ci l’accusent d’avoir trompé les consommateurs, en particulier dans sa communication sur son ambition d’atteindre la neutralité carbone en 2050. L’audience  se tiendra le 5 juin.
data.translatedTitle: The sincerity of the total "climate" strategy examined in court, a first in France
data.translatedDescription: An appeal for "misleading commercial practices" had been filed, in 2022, by three NGOs against the oil giant, before the Paris court. They accuse him of having deceived consumers, in particular in his communication on his ambition to achieve carbon neutrality in 2050. The hearing will be held on June 5.

data.title: Onde de choc à Washington après le meurtre par balles de deux diplomates israéliens
data.description: Originaire de Chicago, l’auteur présumé, Elias Roriguez, a expliqué avoir agi au nom de la cause palestinienne. Jeune couple sur le point de se marier, les deux victimes, Sarah Milgrim, 26 ans, et Yaron Lischinsky, 30 ans, participaient à un gala dans le musée juif de la capitale américaine.
data.translatedTitle: Washington shock wave after the bullets of two Israeli diplomats
data.translatedDescription: Originally from Chicago, the alleged author, Elias Roriguez, explained that he had acted on behalf of the Palestinian cause. Young couple about to get married, the two victims, Sarah Milgrim, 26, and Yaron Lischinsky, 30, participated in a gala in the Jewish museum of the American capital.

data.title: Inondations en Australie : quatre morts et 50 000 personnes toujours bloquées par les eaux
data.description: Quatre corps ont, pour l’instant, été découverts dans le nord de la Nouvelle-Galles du Sud, où les secours évaluent les dégâts et préparent de vastes opérations de nettoyage après les pluies torrentielles.
data.translatedTitle: Floods in Australia: four dead and 50,000 people still blocked by waters
data.translatedDescription: Four bodies have, for the moment, been discovered in northern South Wales, where the emergency services have evaluated the damage and prepare large cleaning operations after the torrential rains.

data.title: Un juge fédéral bloque l’expulsion par l’administration Trump d’immigrés vers le Soudan du Sud, transférés à Djibouti
data.description: Huit immigrés, qui avaient été embarqués mardi à bord d’un vol vers le Soudan du Sud, ont été transférés vers ce petit pays de la corne de l’Afrique après l’absence d’accord de leurs pays d’origine pour les accueillir.
data.translatedTitle: A federal judge blocks the expulsion by the Trump administration of immigrants to South Sudan, transferred to Djibouti
data.translatedDescription: Eight immigrants, who had been on Tuesday on Tuesday on a flight to South Sudan, were transferred to this small country in the Horn of Africa after the lack of agreement of their countries of origin to welcome them.

data.title: Washington: Ermordung israelischer Botschaftsmitarbeiter erschüttert Hauptstadt
data.description: Der Anschlag auf zwei junge Mitarbeiter der israelischen Botschaft erschüttert die US-Hauptstadt. Der Attentäter handelte wohl aus Hass. Durch die Tat wird das politische Klima im Land weiter vergiftet.
data.translatedTitle: Washington: murder of Israeli embassy employees shakes capital
data.translatedDescription: The attack on two young employees of the Israeli embassy shakes the US capital. The assassin acted out of hatred. The political climate in the country is further poisoned by the crime.

data.title: Eklat mit Südafrikas Präsident Ramaphosa: Trumps angeblicher Genozid-Beweis stammt aus Kongo-Video
data.description: Im Oval Office überzog Donald Trump den südafrikanischen Präsidenten mit Vorwürfen über angeblichen Massenmord an Weißen in dessen Land. Die US-Belege sind allerdings alles andere als überzeugend.

data.translatedDescription: In the Oval Office, Donald Trump passed the South African president with allegations about alleged mass murder of whites in its country. However, the US documents are anything but convincing.

data.title: News: Wladimir Putin, Wolodymyr Selenskyj, Donald Trump, Iran, Israel, Rafał Trzaskowski, Karol Nawrocki
data.description: Der russische Präsident kündigt eine neue Militäraktion gegen die Ukraine an. In Rom verhandeln USA und Iran. Und: Polens Präsidentschaftskandidaten im TV-Duell. Das ist die Lage am Freitagmorgen.

data.title: Als die Welt von Deutschlands Verbrechen erfuhr
data.description: Bereits im Mai 1945 sah das traumatisierte Europa Bilder von deutscher Gewalt und Vernichtung. Das Deutsche Historische Museum in Berlin erinnert an diesen Moment der Trauer – in dem jüdische Opfer erstaunlich unsichtbar blieben.
data.translatedTitle: When the world learned of Germany's crime
data.translatedDescription: As early as May 1945, the traumatized Europe saw pictures of German violence and annihilation. The German Historical Museum in Berlin is reminiscent of this moment of grief - in which Jewish victims remained amazingly invisible.

data.title: Flut in Australien: Zahl der Toten steigt auf vier – aber das Wasser geht zurück
data.description: Der ganze Regen für sechs Monate fiel in 72 Stunden: Extreme Niederschläge sorgen im Osten Australiens weiter für Chaos. Mindestens vier Menschen starben. Immerhin: Das Wetter beruhigt sich langsam.
data.translatedTitle: Flood in Australia: Number of dead rises to four - but the water goes back
data.translatedDescription: The whole rain for six months fell in 72 hours: Extreme rainfall continues to ensure chaos in the east of Australia. At least four people died. After all, the weather is slowly calming.

data.title: Uma neurocientista lê os jornais
data.description: Faz parte da vida de todo cientista ler jornais para se manter a par dos eventos, mas jornal de cientista é diferente. Um "jornal" em português é o panfleto diário que traz as novidades do dia anterior, entre outras coisas. A palavra vem do francês journal, que descreve os escritos referentes a um dia (jour), e journaliste é quem escreve sobre eventos diários. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 23h00)
data.translatedTitle: A neuroscientist reads the newspapers
data.translatedDescription: It is part of every scientist's life to read newspapers to keep up with events, but a scientist newspaper is different. A "newspaper" in Portuguese is the daily pamphlet that brings the news from the previous day, among other things. The word comes from the French Journal, which describes the writings for one day (Jour), and Journaliste is the one who writes about daily events. Read more (05/22/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Pressão na Previdência vai além de congelar o salário mínimo
data.description: Ao falar na "Brazil Conference and MIT", em Boston (12/4/2025), o ex-presidente do Banco Central Arminio Fraga defendeu o congelamento do salário mínimo por seis anos, com reajuste apenas pela inflação do ano anterior. Desse modo, a medida abrangeria os dois anos finais do atual mandato do presidente Lula e mais quatro anos, caso ele venha a ser reeleito em 2026. O objetivo seria deter, nesse período, a trajetória explosiva dos gastos previdenciários. Corresponderia a um ajuste fiscal de 1% do PIB no período. Arminio mexeu em um vespeiro . Sua ideia repercutiu negativamente nas redes sociais, onde foi tachado de insensível e de outros adjetivos. A Associação Brasileira de Economistas pela Democracia (Abed) repudiou publicamente a proposta, "de forma contundente", e a considerou "elitista, cruel e inaceitável". Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 22h00)
data.translatedTitle: Pressure in Social Security goes beyond freezing the minimum wage
data.translatedDescription: Speaking of the "Brazil Conference and Mit" in Boston (12/4/2025), former Central Bank President Arminio Fraga defended the minimum wage freezing for six years, with readjustment only for inflation of the previous year. Thus, the measure would cover the final two years of President Lula's current term and four more years, if he was reelected in 2026. The goal would be to deter, during this period, the explosive trajectory of social security spending. It would correspond to a fiscal adjustment of 1% of GDP in the period. Arminio moved in a wasp. His idea echoed negatively on social networks, where he was insensitive and other adjectives. The Brazilian Association of Economists for Democracy (ABED) publicly repudiated the proposal, "bluntly," and considered it "elitist, cruel and unacceptable." Read more (05/22/2025 - 22h00)

data.title: 'Memória é parte da construção de um país mais justo', diz leitora
data.description: Memória " Justiça manda Prefeitura de SP trocar nomes de 11 endereços ligados à ditadura militar; veja quais " (Cotidiano, 22/5). Nomear ruas e praças é um gesto de memória que envolve escolha. Homenagear torturadores em espaços públicos naturaliza a violência e apaga o sofrimento das vítimas. Mudar esses nomes é um ato de reparação, respeito e compromisso com a democracia. Não se trata de reescrever a história, mas de contá-la sem glorificar quem atentou contra ela. Memória, verdade e justiça são parte da construção de um país mais justo. Maria da Graça Pimentel (São Carlos, SP) Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 20h27)
data.translatedTitle: 'Memory is part of the construction of a fairer country,' says reader
data.translatedDescription: Memory "Justice sends SP City Hall to change names of 11 addresses linked to the military dictatorship; see which" (daily life, 22/5). Naming streets and squares is a gesture of memory that involves choosing. Honor torturers in public spaces naturalizes violence and erases the suffering of the victims. Changing these names is an act of reparation, respect and commitment to democracy. It is not a question of rewriting the story, but of telling it without glorifying those who attacked it. Memory, truth and justice are part of the construction of a fairer country. Maria da Graça Pimentel (São Carlos, SP) Read more (05/22/2025 - 20h27)

data.title: Regulamentar o TikTok não vai nos salvar
data.description: Não adianta apontar o dedo para o TikTok e fingir que a internet virou um faroeste chinês por culpa de Pequim. Crimes digitais que envolvem menores acontecem em todos os cantos da rede, mas o discurso higienizador se resume a um aplicativo, sem o conhecimento necessário de como a internet brasileira virou um terreno baldio, sem cerca nem fiscalização, enquanto seguimos tratando o caos como se fosse apenas uma questão de moderação algorítmica. Falta política pública. Falta estrutura. Falta coragem. E sobra marketing pessoal. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 19h30)
data.translatedTitle: Regulate Tiktok won't save us
data.translatedDescription: It's no use pointing to Tiktok's finger and pretending that the internet has become a Chinese western because of Beijing's fault. Digital crimes that involve minors happen in every corner of the network, but the sanitizing discourse comes down to an application, without the necessary knowledge of how the Brazilian internet became a vacant ground, without fence or inspection, while we continue to treat chaos as if it were just a matter of algorithmic moderation. Public policy is missing. Missing structure. Missing courage. And left personal marketing. Read more (05/22/2025 - 19h30)

data.title: Governo vai travar R$ 7,8 bi em emendas parlamentares para cumprir regras fiscais
data.description: O governo de Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva ( PT ) vai travar R$ 7,8 bilhões em emendas parlamentares para ajudar no cumprimento de regras fiscais, disse nesta quinta-feira (22) o secretário de Orçamento Federal do Ministério do Planejamento, Clayton Montes. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 19h29)
data.translatedTitle: Government will stop R $ 7.8 billion in parliamentary amendments to comply with tax rules
data.translatedDescription: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) will stop R $ 7.8 billion in parliamentary amendments to help comply with tax rules, said the Federal Budget Secretary of the Ministry of Planning, Clayton Montes. Read More (05/22/2025 - 19h29)

data.title: Lula cobra mais de R$ 40 bi de imposto, azeda revisão fiscal e vai apanhar na política
data.description: Os economistas do governo disseram que vão fazer o arroz com feijão para cumprir o "arcabouço fiscal". No meio desse caldo, vieram uns caroços grandes de azeitona, aumentos de IOF, que anualmente renderiam R$ 40 bilhões . Isto é, a fim de respeitar a meta de déficit primário, Lula 3 vai cobrar um dinheiro extra. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 19h16)
data.translatedTitle: Lula charges more than R $ 40 billion of tax, sour tax review and will catch in politics
data.translatedDescription: Government economists said they will make rice with beans to fulfill the "fiscal frame." In the midst of this broth came some large olive lumps, IOF increases, which would yield $ 40 billion annually. That is, in order to respect the target of primary deficit, Lula 3 will charge extra money. Read More (05/22/2025 - 19h16)

data.title: Flexibilização do licenciamento ambiental vira prioridade de ruralistas e deve avançar na Câmara
data.description: Aprovado no Senado na noite de quarta-feira (21), o projeto de lei que flexibiliza e simplifica o licenciamento ambiental já é prioridade da bancada ruralista na Câmara dos Deputados . O texto deve avançar ainda neste semestre na Casa, mantendo um novo mecanismo apadrinhado pelo presidente do Senado , Davi Alcolumbre ( União Brasil -AP). Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 19h14)
data.translatedTitle: Flexibility of environmental licensing becomes priority of ruralists and should advance in the Chamber
data.translatedDescription: Approved in the Senate on Wednesday night (21), the bill that flexes and simplifies environmental licensing is already a priority of the ruralist bench in the House of Representatives. The text should advance this semester in the house, maintaining a new mechanism sponsored by the Senate President, David Alcolumbre (União Brasil -ap). Read More (05/22/2025 - 19h14)

data.title: Projeto de licenciamento gera judicialização e é recado ruim em ano de COP, diz deputado
data.description: O deputado federal Aliel Machado (PV-PR) afirmou nesta quinta-feira (22) que o projeto aprovado pelo Senado que flexibiliza as regras de licenciamento ambiental no país vai gerar judicialização, caso seja sancionado como está, e passa um recado ruim no ano em que o Brasil vai sediar a COP30 . Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 19h12)
data.translatedTitle: Licensing project generates judicialization and is a bad message in COP year, says Deputy
data.translatedDescription: Federal Deputy Aliel Machado (PV-PR) said on Thursday (22) that the project approved by the Senate that flexes environmental licensing rules in the country will generate judicialization, if sanctioned as it is, and passes a bad message in the year Brazil will host COP30. Read More (05/22/2025 - 19h12)

The company and the journalist will appeal. Read More (05/22/2025 - 18h49)

data.title: CEF lidera crédito consignado privado com menor juro
data.description: Preocupado com o impacto do consignado privado no setor, o departamento de economia da Abras (Associação Brasileira de Supermercados) fez um levantamento com dados do e-Social de 20 mil funcionários de redes associadas e descobriu que, somente em abril, eles tomaram R$ 70 milhões com taxa média de juros de 6,98%, um pouco abaixo do crédito pessoal. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 18h38)
data.translatedTitle: CEF leads private payroll loans with less interest
data.translatedDescription: Concerned about the impact of private consignment on the sector, the Department of Economics of Abras (Brazilian Supermarket Association) surveyed with e-Social data from 20,000 associated networks and found that, in April alone, they took $ 70 million with an average interest rate of 6.98%, just below personal credit. Read more (05/22/2025 - 18h38)

data.description: A Secretaria de Fazenda de São Paulo não aderiu ao convênio assinado por 15 estados que permite o envio de notas fiscais da venda de combustíveis para a ANP (Agência Nacional de Petróleo). Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 18h24)

data.title: Netanyahu diz ter aval de Trump na guerra e acusa críticos de apoio ao Hamas
data.description: Criticado por aliados da Europa que exigem um cessar-fogo urgente na Faixa de Gaza e, ao mesmo tempo, pressionado por parceiros de coalizão que ainda pedem a intensificação dos ataques, o primeiro-ministro de Israel, Binyamin Netanyahu , tem equilibrado as tensões com o argumento de que o presidente dos Estados Unidos , Donald Trump , apoia as ações atuais das forças israelenses no território palestino. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 18h24)
data.translatedTitle: Netanyahu says he has Trump's endorsement and accuses critics of support for Hamas
data.translatedDescription: Criticized by allies in Europe that require urgent ceasefire in the Gaza Strip and, at the same time, pressured by coalition partners who still ask for the intensification of attacks, Israeli Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu has balanced tensions with the argument that United States President Donald Trump supports the current actions of Israeli forces in Palestinian territory. Read more (05/22/2025 - 18h24)

data.title: Operação contra o Comando Vermelho prende nove em Teresópolis (RJ); suspeito está foragido
data.description: Nove suspeitos de integrar o CV (Comando Vermelho) foram presos nesta quinta-feira (22) em Teresópolis, na região serrana do Rio, durante operação conjunta do Ministério Público , Polícia Civil e Polícia Militar . A ação teve como alvo o grupo que controla o tráfico de drogas no Complexo PPR, formado pelas comunidades do Perpétuo, Pimentel e Rosário. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 18h20)
data.translatedTitle: Operation against Red Command arrests nine in Teresópolis (RJ); Suspect is on the run
data.translatedDescription: Nine suspects of integrating the CV (Red Command) were arrested on Thursday (22) in Teresópolis, in the mountainous region of Rio, during the joint operation of the Public Prosecution Service, Civil Police and Military Police. The action targeted the group that controls drug trafficking in the PPR complex, formed by the communities of Perpetual, Pimentel and Rosario. Read more (05/22/2025 - 18h20)

data.title: Juiz federal bloqueia plano de Trump de desmanchar Departamento de Educação
data.description: Um juiz federal proibiu o governo do presidente Donald Trump de implementar seu decreto para desmantelar o Departamento de Educação e ordenou, nesta quinta-feira (22), a reintegração dos funcionários cortados na última demissão em massa . Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 18h08)

data.translatedDescription: A federal judge prohibited President Donald Trump's government from implementing his decree to dismantle the Department of Education and ordered, on Thursday (22), the reintegration of employees cut in the last mass dismissal. Read more (05/22/2025 - 18h08)

data.title: São Paulo tem 44 casos de oropouche em 2025, aumento de 450% em relação a 2024
data.description: O estado de São Paulo confirmou, neste ano, 44 casos de febre oropouche . O número representa um aumento de 450% em relação aos casos registrados em todo o ano de 2024, quando o Centro de Vigilância Epidemiológica (CVE) notificou oito casos da doença no estado. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h57)
data.translatedTitle: São Paulo has 44 cases of Oropouche in 2025, an increase of 450% compared to 2024
data.translatedDescription: The state of Sao Paulo confirmed, this year, 44 cases of oropouche fever. The number represents an increase of 450% compared to cases recorded throughout 2024, when the Epidemiological Surveillance Center (CVE) notified eight cases of the disease in the state. Read More (05/22/2025 - 17h57)

data.title: Governo eleva IOF em operações de crédito para empresas e prevê arrecadar R$ 61,5 bi em dois anos
data.description: O governo do presidente Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) decidiu elevar o IOF (Imposto sobre Operações Financeiras) sobre crédito destinado às empresas para aumentar a arrecadação e ajudar no cumprimento das metas fiscais. A medida também faz ajustes na tributação do IOF de outras operações, como seguros e câmbio. Não haverá alteração no IOF na contratação de crédito por pessoas físicas. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h46)
data.translatedTitle: Government Elevates IOF in credit operations for companies and provides for raising R $ 61.5 billion in two years
data.translatedDescription: The government of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva (PT) decided to raise the IOF (Financial Operations Tax) on credit to companies to increase the collection and help meet the fiscal goals. The measure also makes adjustments in IOF taxation from other operations, such as insurance and gearbox. There will be no change in IOF in contracting credit by individuals. Read More (05/22/2025 - 17h46)

data.title: Marina Ruy Barbosa se despede do ruivo e surge loira
data.description: Marina Ruy Barbosa surpreendeu seus seguidores ao surgir loira nas redes sociais nesta quinta-feira (22). A atriz se despediu dos fios ruivos, sua marca registrada, ao anunciar uma nova parceria com uma marca de beleza. Atualmente na Europa para uma série de compromissos internacionais, ela celebrou a transformação "É hora de uma revolução loira", escreveu em inglês e completou: "O início de uma nova era! Não poderia estar mais feliz e confiante." Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h43)
data.translatedTitle: Marina Ruy Barbosa says goodbye to the redhead and appears blonde
data.translatedDescription: Marina Ruy Barbosa surprised her followers by appearing blonde on social networks on Thursday (22). The actress said goodbye to the redheads, her trademark, announcing a new partnership with a beauty brand. Currently in Europe for a series of international commitments, she celebrated the transformation "It's time for a blond revolution," he wrote in English and added: "The beginning of a new era! It could not be happier and more confident." Read More (05/22/2025 - 17h43)

data.title: Claro financia projeto de agência da ONU para mulheres sob risco
data.description: A Claro e a agência ONU Mulheres firmaram um acordo para desenvolver um projeto de apoio a mulheres refugiadas ou em situação de violência doméstica. O "Mulher + Tech-Conexão para Novos Começos" será implementado em dez capitais brasileiras e capacitará 1.300 mulheres em direitos humanos e letramento digital ao longo de um ano. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h43)
data.translatedTitle: Of course finances UN agency project for women at risk
data.translatedDescription: Claro and the UN Women Agency have signed an agreement to develop a project to support refugees or in a situation of domestic violence. "Woman + Tech-Connection for New Comens" will be implemented in ten Brazilian capitals and will enable 1,300 women in human rights and digital literacy over a year. Read More (05/22/2025 - 17h43)

data.title: Educação superior a distância: garantir acesso com qualidade
data.description: Na segunda-feira (19), o presidente Lula e o ministro da Educação , Camilo Santana , assinaram o decreto que institui um novo marco regulatório para a educação superior a distância no Brasil . A medida representa um passo decisivo para conciliar os avanços tecnológicos com o compromisso inegociável com a qualidade da formação acadêmica e profissional. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h19)

O título do enredo será "Rita Lee, a Padroeira da Liberdade" e, segundo a direção da agremiação, o desfile exaltará a rebeldia e a originalidade da artista. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h02)

The title of the plot will be "Rita Lee, the patron saint of freedom" and, according to the direction of the group, the parade will exalt the artist's rebellion and originality. data.title: Na velhice, dependência funcional aumenta isolamento social e afeta a saúde mental
data.description: O Brasil vive um processo acelerado de envelhecimento . Em 2023, de acordo com o Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia (IBGE), cerca de 32,1 milhões de pessoas tinham 60 anos ou mais. Isso equivale a 15,6 % da população em comparação à taxa de 8,7 % vista em 2000. A estimativa é de que esse percentual chegue a 37,8 % em 2070, com uma parcela significativa acima dos 80 anos. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 17h00)
data.translatedTitle: In old age, functional dependence increases social isolation and affects mental health
data.translatedDescription: Brazil is experiencing an accelerated process of aging. In 2023, according to the Brazilian Institute of Geography (IBGE), about 32.1 million people were 60 years old or older. This is equivalent to 15.6 % of the population compared to the rate of 8.7 % seen in 2000. It is estimated that this percentage reaches 37.8 % in 2070, with a significant portion over 80 years. data.title: Alcolumbre diz que CPMI do INSS será lida em 17 de junho
data.description: O presidente do Senado , Davi Alcolumbre ( União Brasil -AP), afirmou nesta quinta-feira (22) que vai ler o requerimento de criação da CPMI (Comissão Parlamentar Mista de Inquérito) do INSS (Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social) em 17 de junho, na próxima sessão do Congresso. A sessão conjunta estava prevista para o próximo dia 27, mas Alcolumbre alegou que não há acordo entre os parlamentares sobre os vetos do governo Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT). O senador também rechaçou a convocação de uma sessão exclusiva para a leitura da CPMI. "Os líderes do governo, do Senado, têm que procurar se reunir o mais rápido possível porque impreterivelmente nós vamos ter uma sessão do Congresso Nacional para deliberarmos tudo o que tivermos de deliberar", disse Alcolumbre a jornalistas. Leia mais (05/22/2025 - 16h34)
data.translatedTitle: Alcolumbre says that CPMI of the INSS will be read on June 17
data.translatedDescription: Senate President David Alcolumbre (União Brasil -ap), said on Thursday (22) that he will read the request for the creation of the CPMI (Mixed Parliamentary Commission of Inquiry) of the INSS (National Institute of Social Security) on June 17, at the next congress session. The joint session was scheduled for the 27th, but Alcolumbre claimed that there is no agreement between parliamentarians about the vetoes of the government Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva (PT). The senator also rejected the convening of an exclusive session for reading CPMI. "Senate government leaders have to try to gather as soon as possible because we will have a National Congress session to deliberate everything we have to deliberate," Alcolumbre told journalists. Read more (05/22/2025 - 16h34)

data.title: Army chief’s elevation to field marshal splits PTI
data.description: ISLAMABAD: There appears to be a split in the PTI over Chief of Army Staff Asim Munir’s promotion to the rank of field marshal, as its interim chairman Gohar Ali Khan felicitated the newly appointed field marshal as opposed to the incarcerated party founder, Imran Khan, who criticised the government’s move. If a message posted on his X handle is to be believed, Imran Khan criticised the promotion in his interaction with lawyers, family members, and journalists during a hearing in the Adiala Jail  courtroom on Wednesday. The tweet was posted on Thursday morning,  however. It may be noted that the PTI leader had also met his sisters and lawyers, including Salman Safdar and Usman Gill, on the jail premises on  Wednesday. The former premier doesn’t have access to his X account and someone else posts on his behalf, but the PTI has never revealed the identity of Mr Khan’s social media handler. The PTI founder said it would have been more app­ropriate if Gen Asim Munir had been declared ‘king’ as Pakistan was being run according to the ‘law of the jungle’. He quipped that in the law of the jungle, “there is only one king”. The harsh stance taken by the former prime minister comes in contrast to his party leaders, particularly Gohar Ali Khan, who also met him in jail on Thursday. Barrister Gohar told a local news channel that Allah has given the honour to COAS Asim Munir and also entailed responsibility. “I request all to improve/normalise the situation of the country,” he said. Dawn.com quoted him as saying that there would be a formal statement by the PTI on the development. “This is why I am saying that the [army chief] has gotten this new honour of field marshal. [We] have congratulated, but after this new honour, there is an increased responsibility on him to play his role even more and make the situation better,” he told reporters outside the jail as per Dawn.com . View this post on Instagram “We have no strife with the military. Khan sahib also said yesterday that we stand with our armed forces and whoever is related to the armed forces will be uncontroversial,” he added. PTI leader’s sister Aleema Khan criticised the interim chairman, Barrister Gohar, in her interaction with media persons, saying that he gave the statement felicitating the army chief in his personal capacity. The opinion of the party is not the opinion of Barrister Gohar, she added. “We have given the statement of the founder of PTI yesterday,” she said, adding that Barrister Gohar could speak for the PTI in the presence of the party founder. The founder clearly said yesterday (Wednesday) that there was “a law of the jungle here, it would be better if the army chief gave himself the title of the king”, she added. Earlier this week, the federal cabinet approved the promotion of COAS Asim Munir to the rank of field marshal for his leadership in the recent conflict with India known as ‘Marka-i-Haq’. ‘No deal’ A post on Mr Khan’s X account said the rumours regarding a deal were not correct, but he still invited the establishment for talks for the sake of the country. The post added Mr Khan did not want any deal or relief. It was “unfortunate that the law only applied to the weak in Pakistan and it was against the principles of democracy and the rule of law”. The post also criticised the drone attack in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and directed the provincial government to register a protest with the federal government and make sure that it was not repeated. He said that the killing of people with drones cannot reduce terrorism. It added that Pakistan made a lot of efforts to stop drone attacks by the United States, adding that bombs should not be dropped on own people. As per the post, Mr Khan praised the role of armed forces, especially the air force, which thwarted Narendra Modi’s attempts to attack Pakistan and suggested they be ready for such actions in future. Gandapur’s IMF warning Meanwhile, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Chief Minister Ali Amin Gandapur warned the federal government that it could reconsider its cooperation with the federal government over the IMF conditions if party leaders were not allowed to meet the incarcerated leader. Speaking to media persons outside Adiala Jail after meeting Imran Khan, the CM said the PTI founding leader was willing to initiate dialogue “in the best interest of Pakistan”. He said that if party leaders were denied access to Imran Khan, the PTI would reconsider its cooperation with the government, including on key issues like compliance with IMF conditions. Meanwhile, the PTI spokesperson issued a statement, condemning the delays in scheduling bail hearings in the cases of the party’s founding chairman. PTI Central Information Secretary Sheikh Waqqas Akram, in a statement on Thursday, flayed the regime for allegedly subjecting Imran Khan to harsh conditions. “Such oppressive and sinister tactics are destined to fail, as (Imran) Khan’s spirit remains unbroken and resolute as the entire nation stands firmly behind its leader. PTI will not hold talks…because they (government) did not have legal, constitutional and moral authorities in this regard,” he claimed. He emphasised that the government should not trust India and refrain from resuming dialogue until it renounces terrorism, restores the Indus Waters Treaty, and reinstates the constitutional status of occupied Kashmir. Mohammad Asghar in Rawalpindi and Malik Asad in Islamabad also contributed to this report Published in Dawn, May 23rd, 2025
